net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.gui.panels

Class VocableTrainerRunPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.gui.panels.VocableTrainerPanel
              • net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.gui.panels.VocableTrainerRunPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class VocableTrainerRunPanel
extends VocableTrainerPanel
    VocableTrainerRunPanel is responsible for managing the vocabulary training session. It handles the display of words, user input, timing, and tracking of results.

    This panel interacts with the VocableTrainerFrame to switch between different panels and updates the database with the user's progress.

    See Also:
    VocableTrainerFrame, VocableTrainerRunSettings, VokabeltrainerDB, Serialized Form

      • VocableTrainerRunPanel

        public VocableTrainerRunPanel(VocableTrainerFrame vtf,
                              VocableTrainerRunSettings settings)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a new VocableTrainerRunPanel with the specified frame and settings. Initializes the UI components and starts the training session.
        Parameters:
        vtf - the main frame of the Vocable Trainer application
        settings - the settings for the current training run
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no cards are available for the selected settings
